title: Why Did You Killed Danny ? . Destroyed World In 2050
description: After world war in 2035 , the whole world is destroyed only few have survived , but how long can they survive , now there is no law, no rule , only gangs rule the land , which once were beautiful cities ,are barren lands now, killing of innocents have just begin , charlie was the one whose family was killed by the most powerful gang of paris , his one year old brother danny was murdered his sister was seperated from him , , now charlie is grown up , its 2050 now , he want his revenge , but he fall in love with a girl , a rich one , who brought love in his life and troubles too , where the story will turn ? This is a story of an ordinary boy , who is weak , who fears to go out in dark, who thinks others to be powerful then him , but he is a survivor who survived in extreme conditions.
author: Charlie James Jr.
